name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Wood-fired pizza with fresh tomatoes, basil, and buffalo mozzarella. Simple, bright, and delicious.

name: Crispy Chicken Burger
description: Buttermilk fried chicken, house slaw, and spicy mayo on a toasted brioche bun.

name: Herbed Salmon Bowl
description: Pan-seared salmon with quinoa, seasonal greens and lemon herb dressing.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
description: Crispy wings tossed in buffalo sauce with blue cheese dip.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons and classic caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Steak
description: Premium ribeye steak grilled to perfection with garlic butter.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta with bacon, egg yolk, parmesan and black pepper.

name: Fresh Spring Rolls
description: Rice paper rolls filled with vegetables, shrimp and peanut sauce.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
